report.title: UKBMS specific species and occurrence counts by site
report.description: UKBMS specific: Lists locations and the number of species and occurrences within them. This report includes the location code, and relies on the record being input with a link to the site and will not pick up records where the spatial reference is in the site boundary but without a direct reference to the site.
report.query: WITH RECURSIVE search_samples(top_id, id, location_id, survey_id, date_start, date_end, depth) AS ( SELECT s.id, s.id, s.location_id, s.survey_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, 1 FROM samples s WHERE s.deleted=false UNION ALL SELECT ss.id, s.id, ss.location_id, ss.survey_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, ss.depth+1 FROM samples s, search_samples ss WHERE s.parent_id = ss.id AND s.deleted=false ) SELECT #columns# FROM surveys su JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.website_id=su.website_id and lw.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON l.id=lw.location_id and l.deleted=false AND (l.code = '' OR l.code IS NULL OR '#blank_code#'!='yes') LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id LEFT JOIN (search_samples s JOIN cache_occurrences o on o.sample_id=s.id AND o.zero_abundance='f' ) on s.survey_id=su.id AND s.location_id=l.id #joins# WHERE su.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(l.location_type_id AS character varying)='#location_type_id#' OR '#location_type_id#'='' OR ctt.term='#location_type_id#') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date))

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: locattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of location attribute IDs to include
